name: Survive the Onslaught
description:
A simple asteroids like game made for the Bullet Hell Jam (2021).

Survive for 60 seconds, while your ship only has 10 seconds before it explodes.

Kill enemy ships to increase your ship's  time limit.

Each shot fired and shield activated costs 1 second, so use them wisely.

Controls:

Left and Right arrow keys or A and D: Move left and right.

Z and J: Fire bullet.

X and K: Activate Shield.

Esc: Quit game.

M: Toggle Music.
